caption:
“In every step, eternity listens.”

Reflection:
Every footprint echoes through forever. The smallest act of love leaves a trail of light.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches that nothing done in faith is wasted. Our daily walk becomes testimony — each moment heard by heaven.
